rdfs:Class.rdfs:label: Εκτίμηση Κατάστασης
Оценка Состояния
Expertise de l'état matériel
Zustandsfeststellung
Condition Assessment
Avaliação do Estado Material
状态评估
rdfs:Class.rdfs:comment: This class describes the act of assessing the state of preservation of an object during a particular period. The condition assessment may be carried out by inspection, measurement or through historical research. This class is used to document circumstances of the respective assessment that may be relevant to interpret its quality at a later stage, or to continue research on related documents.
